manifest.name: Financial Literacy Pack
manifest.author: Donegeon Team
manifest.description: Learn the basics of money management with these finance-themed quests.

quests.title: Open a Savings Account
quests.description: Set up a jar or box to act as your personal savings account.

quests.title: Make a Deposit
quests.description: Add a portion of your earnings to your savings account.

quests.title: Create a Budget
quests.description: With help, write down a simple budget for your weekly spending and saving.

quests.title: Track Your Spending
quests.description: Keep a log of everything you spend money on for one week.

quests.title: Research a Big Purchase
quests.description: Research and compare prices for an item you want to buy.

quests.title: Chore for Hire
quests.description: Offer to do an extra chore to earn some extra money.

markets.title: The Gilded Vault
markets.description: Invest your earnings in valuable assets and rewards.

gameAssets.name: Monocle
gameAssets.description: A fancy monocle for a distinguished financier avatar.

gameAssets.name: Piggy Bank
gameAssets.description: A classic piggy bank for your collection.

gameAssets.name: Stock Certificate
gameAssets.description: A real-world reward: a small contribution to a savings or investment account.
